Context:
The text provides information about ways to learn more about George Brown College and its student life. Here are some factual information and entities extracted from the text:

1. Three campuses located in downtown Toronto.
2. Tours available for learning about campus life and student services.
3. Opportunity to chat with faculty and employees for program-specific details.
4. Info sessions offered for detailed discussions on various topics related to college.
5. One-on-one advisory sessions on various topics.
6. Social media hub where you can get a feel for life at George Brown College.
7. New student orientation available both online and in-person before each semester.
8. Land acknowledgment information.
9. Sign up to receive updates about application deadlines, college news, upcoming events, tours, and more.
10. Contact information: 416-415-2000, TTY: 1-877-515-5559, ask.george@georgebrown.ca.
11. Social media hub link provided.
12. Information subject to change without notice.
13. Students responsible for verifying George Brown College fee requirements.
